item.title: [MOD-SRS2012] Backhoe loader Ford 555
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hi, I made another porting for Ski region simulator 2012, the JCB 3CX (Ford 555) is a backhoe with pneumatic arms both working, where you can hook the shovel you want. The “digger” has the following features: Rear excavator arm: – moves with (z-x) – moves with keypad number (7-9),(4-6) Front loader arm: moves with […]

item.title: [MOD-SRS2012] Maserati Quattroporte
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hello, everyone, I have created this car: it is a 2005 version of the Maserati Quattroporte. I have added some modifications to the bodywork inspired by the CDC and Bison versions. The sounds are real and taken from the 2005 Quattroporte version with supercharged engine. As this is my first mod from scratch you will […]

item.title: [MOD-SRS2012] Chevrolet Camaro 2014
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hello everyone, I’ve ported this car from the Farming Simulator game to  Ski Region Simulator 2012  This Chevrolet is fifth generation! It also plays the robot Bumblebee in cartoons and the movie Transformers. You can watch the preview video here You can download it on ModHoster Hope you like it, good game!

item.title: [MOD-SRS2012] Elicottero AlouetteII
item.dc:creator: MD
item.description: Hi everyone, I made a porting of this aircraft from the game Farming Simulator 2013 for Ski Region Simulator 2012 In the help menu you will find three languages (Italian,English and German) The Alouette II is a popular helicopter of the 60s, designed in France, used internationally often for military purposes. Video preview here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ij5k9d2x4an65tv/Elicottero-final.mp4 […]
